body:
Greetings muzzing community,

Almost 2 years on Avicus - majority being apart of  the staff. I connected on MCzone around this time, ~couple weeks before Avicus was first released. 

Ask me questions related to my job here on Avicus - as a former admin/mod; to my current responsibilities (mapdev and official). It can be personal, but remember, if I deem the question inappropriate or unnecessary... I will simply ignore it &/or it can be miscellaneous!

It's been a bumpy 2 years :P and I'm still going strong... I guess. It's odd to think how much I've changed in the sense of how I've matured personally/publicly, how I approach things, and how I play minecraft today.

So I'll leave you guys with the questions :):)
keep muzzing \o/

title: Almost 2 years AMA

replies.body:
Why did you retire? (Admin > Mod & Mod > User)
Are you going fishin?
What do you do while you r8 8/8?
replies.body_tagged:
Why did you retire? (Admin > Mod & Mod > User)
Are you going fishin?
What do you do while you r8 8/8?

replies.body:
Why did I retire from Administrator? 
At the time, it felt like the best thing to do. Don't get me wrong I enjoyed managing and dealing with escalating situations... the community seemed they wanted a new administrator. I admit, I have been bias before. I have falsely banned players. I have made many mistakes that couldn't be mended. All in all, I stepped down from Admin due to making way too many mistakes, alongside the communities opinion/feedback. I mean, if the community base doesn't like the admin who is pretty much running the show... it's best for a fresh person to come in 8^)

Why did I retire from Mod?
I was being relied on too much for the first couple months, even though I had no power. It got to a point wher I set myself a goal to assist the new moderators to develop skills... to be more independent - if you will. Before retiring, there were quite a few moderators who really became leaders amongst the staff team. Since my 'goal' was furfilled, my purpose as a moderator depleted. Additionally,  I was lacking moderation (got lazy with reports etc).

Are you going fishing?
Yeah man,  goin' fishin' for likes dard

What do you do while you r8 8/8?
Pvp and muzz!!!!!

replies.body:
My profile picture on the Avicus Network event slack is Dana Kareglazaya :) 

My best moments would have to be... making a positive impact on avicus where ever possible. Whenever I saw someone happy, that made my experience so much better! Managing the stsff team was really enjoyable... had tons of fun :)

My worst...obviously making mistakes. If it's got to be specific, I would say fasely banning users for illegal modifications. You feel soooooo shit when you realise it!

replies.body:
As an admin, what was the hardest decision you had to make?
When Avicus was being attacked by some hackers, (yes staff accounts were hacked), I was pretty much the only senior staff online at the time. I had to ensure that this attack stopped... so I went to contact the perpetrators and reason with them. After 3 hours of constant watch and coordination, my decision to conclude the attack was pretty hard. If I went offline and they started again, no senior staff would have been online.

Funniest moment in cacalmarin within first 13 days?
I can't exactly remember what was being said, but all I can recall was that we (cacalmarin) were in a call playing Kohi team fights and bagging Banway :PP

Favourite Anime? (not in order)
1. Sakusarao no Pet Kanojo
2. Another
3. Clannad /... afterstory
4. Shakugan no Shana series
5. Seitokai Yakuindomo

What type of noodle????
Chicken!!!!

Does this calls for a muzz! 
Everything calls for a muzz

Fishing for comments?
Yup obviously! !
